Text: RE ISDA Energy and Developing Products in LondonDear Liz The agenda is quite fine as is Many thanks for including our suggestions I guess the next step will be to find speakers We should be able to line up about people from RWE and I am sure Enron will contribute in numbers but obsiouly we want as diversified our panel of speakers as possible Best Regards Christophe Chassard RWE Trading UK Limited Wood Street London ECV DL Main switchboard Structuring Direct line Central fax Email mailto Original Message From Liz OSullivan SMTP Sent October To Mark Haedicke Subject ISDA Energy and Developing Products in London I am writing in regards to ISDAs Energy and Developing Products conference in London on December Attached is a copy of the final agenda for your review Thank you both for your input and expertise draftdoc Please let me know if you have any more suggestions to improve the agenda before it goes to print Again thanks Liz Liz OSullivan ISDA Fifth Avenue Rockefeller Center th floor New York NY Phone Fax File draftdoc

RE Energy and Developing Products Conference in London Dear all After having consulted with my colleagues here is our pinch of salt We believe markets participants would be interested in the following topics ECommerce Panel Discussion why some platforms succeed and others do not eg Enron vs ICE the impact of etrading on standardized documentation Convergence of Trading Forms role of a master master in energy marketscross product netting how to deal with different standardized documentation in Europe for similar products eg EFET GTMA Workshop One collateralization of physical gas and electricity transactions under the CSA My esteemed colleague Rita is happy to present a paper on the development of the EFET gas master andor coal trading and has also volunteered to participate to one panel I have also asked another colleague to give an update on the status of EFET for power trading in Continental Europe I dont have his reply yet Best Regards Christophe Chassard RWE Trading UK Limited Wood Street London ECV DL Main switchboard Structuring Direct line Central fax Email mailto Original Message From Liz OSullivan SMTP Sent June To Mark Haedicke Katia dHulster Cc Stacy Carey Ruth Ainslie Mark Taylor Subject Energy and Developing Products Conference in London I am writing in regards to ISDAs Energy and Developing Products conference in London on December I have attached a draft agenda for your review In order to finalize the agenda please advise on the following issues New and Developing Products in Europe Local public policy issues in Europe Product types that are of interest to Europe draftdoc At the last Energy and Developing Products conference held in Houston in March we had problems finding suitable speakers willing to participate in conference Keep in mind we had twenty two speakers for a one day conference As a result we would prefer to have fewer workshops this time in London Workshop in each session we will provide global and regional perspectives on different product types with a focus on business and trading issues Workshop is for attendees who are interested in a more indepth understanding of the ISDA Master Agreement and how it can be used to document energy and power derivatives This workshop will be repeated in session two Please note Houstons conference had one more workshop in session one and session two Please suggest workshop topics that would be of interest to delegates attending the conference I look forward to hearing from you Regards Liz Liz OSullivan ISDA Fifth Avenue Rockefeller Center th floor New York NY Phone Fax File draftdoc
